website_summaries.verdict: A classic card game with an active twist that will keep the whole family engaged.
pros: A simple card game based on matching colors and number
This version of the classic game has been updated with a machine that shoots cards at random
It also has "make your own" wild cards
Rated for age 7+, but younger kids can play this game with a little help
cons: Inserting cards into the dispenser can be tricky
The attack twist can also make the game go on a long time

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the Whole Family (almost)....
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun, fast paced game, with nice surprises. I really like games that rely on a combination of skill, strategy, and luck. That combination creates a nice "democratic" equalizing of success among the players. That means that adults don't have a great advantage over children, yet its fun for both. The surprises of the "attack," when the machine vomits up an unpredictable amount of cards, become great moments of laughter and levity. I find those experiences help create nice "bonding" moments. I'd say this game is fun for the whole family; unless a person is very competitive (because the luck, and unpredictability involved in this game might frustrate those people).
customer_reviews.author: Marc Leibson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Cheap imitation of Uno Attack! Launcher never did work. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy Shuffle
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings on this. My family loves Uno and we were happy to see that this was a quality item after unboxing. Shuffler was made of hard plastic and came with trial batteries, the uno cards were crisp and thick just as they should be. How the game is played was a little confusing but even more confusing was how to control the shuffler. It threw cards out in every direction and each time I found myself on the floor looking for the cards. We have since stopped using the shuffler and play regular UNO as of now
customer_reviews.author: Christa Douglas

customer_reviews.title: This is a very old version of Uno Attack
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same product pictured. This is probably the first version that was ever released as Uno Attack. This is not the item I was expecting at all. I am very disappointed with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chute

customer_reviews.title: Uno Attack Review
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this game. It's fun wondering if cards will come shooting out at any given moment. Cards have been added to throw a wrinkle in the game. I'm a little worried about the cover that has to be taken off every time you want to put cards in the attack module is fragile and will break. It does not appear the attack module won't work without the cover in place. I also wish they would have a kept a uniform point total for the special cards. We changed that part of the game, saying all special cards are worth 20 points. It made the game go faster.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Must have for family game night!
customer_reviews.text: Best family game - honestly you can't help but laugh. During a tense visit with inlaws we all played at the request of my child - everyone was smiling and laughing within minutes. My husband came downstairs in the middle of the first game, dreading the negative overtone that hung around the house and found everyone sitting around the table laughing, smiling, and talking. Later he says "it was weird - like there was a giant family hug that I missed" Pushing the bottom and either having a bunch of cards flying out at you can't help but make you laugh (or everyone to laugh at your unfortunate luck).
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Total Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game and was excited to use it, just to find it didn’t work right out of the box. It made all the sounds, but the wheels didn’t turn and it wouldn’t shoot out cards, which is literally the whole point of the game. I returned it and received another one only to find it had the exact same problem, which resulted in the same disappointment. I wish I could give this game no stars because it has been nothing but a total waste of time and money. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! Ok, Uno may have gotten dull in your home and has caused some of your family members to not choose it for game night. Well, this renews the game play and makes it much more fun and tense. If you have to draw, you are not sure if you are going to get 0 or 5 cards or some other quantity in between. It adds to the enjoyment and changes the pace unexpectedly. Again, this makes the game of Uno a little more interesting and makes for more tension at the game table. Finally, the kids always have a giggle when the parents get the big whammy!
customer_reviews.author: jpaul

customer_reviews.title: It is our families new favorite. We have friends who have know ordered it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter played this at school in the counselors office. If you are an Uno fan you MUST get this! It is our families new favorite. We have friends who have know ordered it. Basic Uno with a few different twists. Instead of picking up a card you have to push the button. The button can shoot out cards. You never know if you are safe or not. You may not get any cards, you may get ten cards! It comes with a few cards that are blank and my daughter filled two of them with 6X and switch cards. It is a blast. A families must have!
customer_reviews.author: Mia123

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Glee
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun! We named the old school uno game “big fat four coming at ya” which is what our five year old would say with a draw four card. This game, OMG the glee on his face is sooooo worth it. The belly laughs when the card shoot out is amazing. What a great great spin to boring Uno! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Traci P.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work Straight Out Of Box
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! I wish I could give this no stars. I love the game itself. However, I purchased this for my son's birthday. We opened it up, planning to end his birthday with a family game of Uno Attack. Unfortunately, the wheels inside the Uno machine don't spin at all, so no cards would spit out. Very disappointing. I purchased this early for his big day...and now that he finally opened it, it's 4 days after the return date. Apparently, I purchased a dud. And can't even return the dud. We are bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestgurl

customer_reviews.title: A game the whole family will love!
customer_reviews.text: My dad got this game for my daughter for Christmas after watching my sister's family play it at Thanksgiving. It is SO MUCH FUN!! I echo what the other reviewers have said about the tension and excitement of the game. The noises and cards shooting out are just hilarious! The best part is when you play the "attack" card and can aim the shooter at any player you want. Sometimes the same player gets ganged up on over & over again, and that makes the game even funnier. We had 3 generations playing it and everyone had a blast!! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. Adame

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the original Uno Attack
customer_reviews.text: The card dispenser machine doesn't have an area for the discards to go after you play them like the first Uno Attack game. Also, the card dispenser top was very difficult to remove in order to insert and/or remove the deck of cards. We took the cards from the new game and started using the old machine again. I did enjoy the sound effects form the new machine whenever you had "draw" cards (push the button), though. And the amount and speed of the cards being spit out from the dispenser whenever you had to push the button/draw cards was cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Ready SET UNO
customer_reviews.text: As someone who recently started getting back into playing card and board games, UNO Attack has been an absolute riot. It takes the fun and easy to understand game of UNO and turns it up to 11. By throwing in Russian roulette style gameplay, you are at the mercy of the card flinging machine. This thing seriously is a lot of fun. Bring it to school or pull it out with friends, no matter what, it's going to be a great time. If you are a fan of UNO, you're going to love it. Please, take my word for it.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Not your Mama's Uno
customer_reviews.text: Wow, Uno Attack is a great game and very addictive. We have had it for 6 months and I love it so much that I had to write a review saying so! It can be very strategic and always interesting since you never know how many cards will shoot out - or not shoot out if you are lucky. There are great wild cards that can stop someone that has claimed Uno. The whole family can play and it may go on for hours! GREAT FAMILY GAME.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Ann McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Save your money till another version comes out
customer_reviews.text: We have now purchased 3 of these and sent 2 back because they didn't work. The third will also be going back. All 3 made a buzzing noise from the speaker after the game was turned on and didn't work at all. One stopped making the noise and nothing after that. One dinged 3 times and then just made a buzzing noise. The 3rd dinged a lot when the button was pressed but cards never came out and then it also started making the buzzing noise and never dinged again. We wanted to replace the old version of the game that we had after it died. We played that one for years. This version of it is just bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great or horrible, depending on if you win or not!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I don't know if I should give it a 1 or 5 star, it truly depends on if I win or not!!! Anyway this game is an amazing or horrible update from the original version, again depending if I win or not. :) This truly randomizes the card output as the old one you could predict the card output. That one I would win every time. Cards are of great quality, and the cards come shooting out with great velocity. Even my 5 year old loves to play!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A. Raviele

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: The machine adds a fun twist to traditional Uno, but we've had it less than 6 months and had to throw it away. It has been malfunctioning over the last few days, and replacing the batteries didn't help. I finally had to throw it out today. First it started spitting out way too many cards (25), then the sound quit working, and then this morning I heard the motor running continuously, and when I found it, it was emitting a burning smell. I switched the machine to OFF, but a few minutes later, it started running again (with burning odor). We have enjoyed this game, but wish we could have gotten more time out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a fun game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift at the request of the recipient. I haven't played the game, but it does look fun. My review is basically for the condition in which the package arrived and that it looks like it would be fun to play. I feel like the price is fair. The game is a little bigger than I expected so I was pleasantly surprised for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, ups the stress a bit (in a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fun, ups the stress a bit (in a good way) and who's ahead can change super quick, even at the last second! We really enjoy plain it with friends. Its only plugged twice and it was just because too many tried to come out at once, and it took like half a second to fix. Haven't had any problems with the cards feeding, but I've also been making sure to treat them nice and keep them in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Erka Heifer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game!! Great spin on the original uno game with lots of extra excitement. There are a couple of cards that you can write on. You can write something like "hit the button 10 times" We chose to make them silly rather than hitting the button so the person who plays it gets to choose any player to do something silly like stand on one foot and sing until your next turn. This is especially fun for the kids when one of the adults have to do it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game
customer_reviews.text: When I was younger, this game was a go-to for my family. Almost weekly we would gather around and play it. Well, we played it so regularly that the motor eventually burned out. So, for Father's Day this year I decided to buy my dad another. He was thrilled to receive it and we played multiple games together that day. I bought this on Amazon because the price was a little lower than any in-store I had seen.Definitely looking forward to more games being played!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Fun twist on Uno but new rule should be loser buys batteries
customer_reviews.text: We love this game and that fact that it shoots cards at you. The only drawback is the battery life. It seems to drain the battery and it takes C batteries, which I never have in stock (but I guess that is a me problem not a we issue).
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Hours of FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing the original Uno game and this Attack version 100 times funner then the old game! My husband, who would rather get a root canal then play a game, will play it for hours with us. If you haven't played Uno before, the rules are pretty simple so it is easy for anyone to learn how to play quickly. The card dispenser sturdy and well made. Since you do spin it from one person to another, I've put some felt pads on the bottom to avoid scratching my table. All of my son's friends are getting this game from us for their birthdays this year!
customer_reviews.author: DietzMom

customer_reviews.title: Old style cards are more fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this updated version of Uno Attack because the cards from our game were so worn out they were sticking to each other. We were a little disappointed with the new cards because they don't have the "switch hands" card. We love that card. It adds another fun element to the game. The new cards also do not have the special "wild card" that makes one player have to hit the dispenser until cards come out or the special "wild card" where everyone has to hit once. The new cards are phony. I found an new deck of the older version cards and we are very happy with the old version cards.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K. Gaan

customer_reviews.title: Game night fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is out go to on game night! Our previous uno attack game broke. This one is fun, but I much rather the older one. The top in much harder to remove to put the cards in. The cards are also different in this one, but the kids seem to be enjoying the change.
customer_reviews.author: K Carbo

customer_reviews.title: Love this game, it works great!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this Uno Attack game! The machine has worked perfectly for us. It has brought many hours of fun and entertainment to our family! I will be purchasing this game for gifts for others. We have taken it to many parties as well as just family game nights! So much fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Austin

customer_reviews.title: Family game night fave!
customer_reviews.text: We love UNO attack, I had an old version from my younger days, we got the kiddo hooked on it so when mine stopped shooting cards out, we had to look for a replacement. This is the bomb! It makes UNO a lot more fun and exciting, you really can't beat a wild game of UNO attack. We have bi-weekly tournaments at our house and all of our guests (young and old) enjoy the game as well.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Excitment
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the family can have fun playing with it, we play this game for hours at a time we all enjoyed, the expectation who will get so many card just as you are about to win, that is the best part of it, fun, fun and more fun
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game, but machine is picky.
customer_reviews.text: Works great... once you put the correct batteries in it... I put in 3 energizer batteries, and the machine didn't work. It would beep but the belts would not turn. I then tried changing them, so I put in 2 energizer batteries and one Duracell, same thing. It finally worked with 3 Duracell batteries. I love it otherwise, was just some confusion. So if you get this, I highly recommend having all Duracell batteries or else you may run into what I did.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Game
customer_reviews.text: The game is played a little differently than regular Uno. My granddaughter loved being the one pointing the attack machine and pressing the button. The machine works as implied...you never know how many cards will come out and sometimes you press the button and no cards come out. It was a fun change to the regular Uno game.
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well was hoping that the other reviews wouldn't happen to us, but alas it did. Kids very excited to play the new Uno Attack. Right out of the box the game won't shoot cards. It makes a sound two different kinds but no cards. Save your time and money, don't get this game.
customer_reviews.author: irelandfamily

customer_reviews.title: Game works but box was crushed
customer_reviews.text: I would expect to receive a box in good condition suitable for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: jfahlsing

customer_reviews.title: A fun game
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun game (if you aren't someone that takes a card game real serious ) It is like uno but instead of a regular draw pile you have to hit the button on the little machine and you never know how many cards will shoot out of it. Our seven year old granddaughter has fun playing with me and will take it to the coast for the family to play.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy P.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite games.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of our favorite family games. We play it so much that our old one quit working. It lasted years. So we finally decided to buy a new one. Great family game.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Family Game
customer_reviews.text: I grew up on Uno family game nights. I purchased Uno Attack for my kids. They love it! We have huge family battles that include grandparents and cousins. I've purchased two more for gifts. The bottom battery compartment can be picky at times (just needs a nudge to complete the closure).
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: The most expensive variation of 52 card pickup! After an additional experience of playing this game with my girls and wife, my wife was horrified how the game would never end (I let it drag on for three hours just for fun). The looks of horror on my wifes face everytime the machine sprayed cards at her was worthy of changing my review. If you intend to quickly end the game, just count the cards and use deck swaps to be aware of all the hands in play.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best card game!!!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t love a game of uno attack.... the one game that can turn happy hour into madness lol... it’s never a dull moment when I gather with family and friends and play uno attack. Perfect way to bond and make memories with everyone
customer_reviews.author: Tac

customer_reviews.title: Great game...But
customer_reviews.text: you need to have 3-"C" batteries for the machine. We had people over, but found out about the batteries the hard way. All I could find was 2...Now that the guest are gone, I now have what I needed.....You just do not run that often needing "C"'s.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tiras

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but still great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas (he’s almost 5) and he loves it! The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because you can tell it’s definitely cheaper made than the ones from my childhood.
customer_reviews.author: AUCharger

customer_reviews.title: Good game for the family to enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: This did what we wanted! Getting the family involved in an activity throughout the winter! Just watch out for the dispenser that throws out the cards, sometimes it gets stuck and you have tot remove the top and align the cards back into the spot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bellemore

customer_reviews.title: Two days old and no longer attacks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game for when my grandkids come as we love uno. Used it for two days and it was a hit. Third night it wouldn't spit when you hit the button. Tried new batteries, cleaning rollers, resetting, etc. so if this game only lasts two nights go play the original version and don't waste your money. If anyone has a suggestion let me know what to do.
customer_reviews.author: llg

customer_reviews.title: One of the most fun games out there.
customer_reviews.text: This beats regular Uno completely. You never know what's going to happen, whether you'll get one card or many. The cards are somewhat different from regular Uno, but that's one thing that makes it more fun. Anyone who gets this game will enjoy it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for sore losers, but lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun! Read the rules because we had a lot of debates about what was acceptable :D It's a very LONG game, so be prepared, but the 12 year olds and 5 year olds loved every minute of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnn A

customer_reviews.title: we love this game
customer_reviews.text: We love this game. We bought this for our son and grandson, since they liked playing our Uno game at our house. You always jump when a lot of cards shoot out at you, but you never know, sometimes no cards come out. It is a great family game, and good for all ages, 5 and up. The child needs to be able to match numbers and colors, and understand the concept of wild cards. We can always help younger players. We never tire of this.
customer_reviews.author: Never Too Old To LearnTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game!!
customer_reviews.text: My little ones have become addicted to UNO so we added UNO Attack. My wife and myself love playing this with them. It is very easy and a lot of added fun. Games with more than 4 people can last a really long time. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kentmj55

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for the whole family!!
customer_reviews.text: We have always loved playing Uno, but it was losing it's charm. Uno attack has brought the fun and laughter back to Uno. Instead of drawing card from the pile, you press the button. If you are lucky you get no cads :) and sometimes a stack right when someone os ready to win. They have a special card for each color and if you get that you can throw all the cards of that color at one tome. If you like Uno, you will love this game
customer_reviews.author: Amazon's Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you love UNO, get this!
customer_reviews.text: Uno is a fun nostalgic and timeless classic card game that almost everyone knows and loves....this brings it up a notch! Everyone loves it when the cards fly and it makes the giggles fly out too. One tip: don't bend the card, the will not be able to come out effectively and will mess up the game. Loads of fun for many ages
customer_reviews.author: stephanie byersmith

customer_reviews.title: Family LOVES this game
customer_reviews.text: My family had a ton of fun with this game while visiting my nephew for vacation. I ended up purchasing for home as well. Easy to play for all ages. We played with adults and it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fun game! Can break easily
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! Can break easily! Ours quit working pretty quickly after we bought it. It got knocked on it's side during a game and it somehow disconnected the wires that are inside of the game. Wasn't too happy about that! Was fun though while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: queenofmyfairytale

customer_reviews.title: great game for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he loves it. The boys love pressing the button and watching several cards come out. We play the game often and even his 4 year old brother loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dondi

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: Our absolute favorite game as a family. Our friend turned us onto it. Although ours has a defect where the arm is loose and doesn't hold down hard. Works okay. They offered us to send back but couldn't because the kids where so in love. Amazing customer service though.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas gift for our African guests. They have a few teenagers and we thought they might like it! Boy did they, we all had hours of fun playing this game! All 13 of us!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A New More-exciting Dimension to an old Game!
customer_reviews.text: It's surprising how nerve-wracking it can be waiting for a dozen Uno cards to shoot out of this "Attack" version of an old favorite. More fun than Uno and improved since the original version, this game always goes with us on camping trips. Stock up on C batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Uno on steroids!
customer_reviews.text: This game is super fun it's like Uno on steroids. Definitely a good gift for kids and adults. That why we got it as a gift for my niece. We actually received the game as a gift so definitely a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymon S.

customer_reviews.title: What a blast!!!
customer_reviews.text: We recently went on a camping trip with some friends and they had an older version of Uno Attack. We played it all day on Saturday and once we got home we decided to order our own. Just played at the other night so many laughs such great memories.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Hours of family-friends fun..
customer_reviews.text: Hours of family-friends fun... Who could go wrong with Uno but when they added the attack I knew I had to buy it... It's great fun and always a surprise when the cards spit out at you. Side note it takes batteries to run but I have been using the same batteries sense I purchased and we have about 30 hours played on the game. So I think it is pretty good on usage
customer_reviews.author: Mandi P.

customer_reviews.title: Family fun game
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandsons loves this game and now adding the attack makes it even better. I love hearing him laugh when it spits out a lot of cards!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Zill

customer_reviews.title: Family fun for ALL
customer_reviews.text: we regularly play the game and have a great time. full of surprises and even our six year old plays with us. it will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: ThatsMe

customer_reviews.title: Fun version for kids and parents!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun and interactive version for both parents and kids. My kids love playing it and so do we. Glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity.

customer_reviews.title: A fun gift for young and old
customer_reviews.text: Competitively priced, timely delivery, packaged well, excellent quality and a great gift. I purchased eight of them for grandkids gifts and families all enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Sailfish

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: 12 yr old grandson keeps winning at this, grandparents are still learning. Fun game NO video or cell phones - actual interaction time - win win
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: REally Fun Version
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about this but am so glad I bought it. So far it has held up really well, adds a little more excitement to Uno and the little one who's 5 is totally able to play. Sometimes the younger one's get left out but this was a perfect family game. Even though the young ones can play along it doesn't lose any of the fun or excitement for the whole group. Have had many night's of fun away from the TV and Playstation. I wouldn't have paid the MF suggest retail price but got a great deal at Christmas. After playing I would even have gave a few bucks more than I did.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: and my 4 year old granddaughter loved playing it so much
customer_reviews.text: We had the older version of Uno Attack, and my 4 year old granddaughter loved playing it so much, I bought their family this one. I really like this version better - it spits out more cards and more often than the original, making for a hilariously fun time! Great family fun!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole Family!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome game to play with the family, every time that we have to push the UNO Attack button is very exciting! Also it has cool sound effects! The only problem is that when the machine shoots the cards some of them come out face up so everyone can see the cards you have, other than that this game is PERFECT !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Great game to play when camping!
customer_reviews.text: This game was a hit with 12 yr old boys and girls! It’s got a few different cards than original uno but no big deal. It’s a very fun game, we take it in the rv every time we go! If this review is helpful please hit the helpful button
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dewitz

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun game (great twist on a classic)
customer_reviews.text: This version of Uno is so much fun with the added unpredictability of how many cards you will receive when you press the "draw" button in the dispenser. Tons of hours of family fun for sure!
customer_reviews.author: SCJ

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Best game ever. My kids play all together (ages 13 to 7) and love it. It made the Uno game so much fun. Highly recommend it. When I bought it in Christmas it was only 17$. Don’t know why now is so expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the family. Even grandpa will play this game now. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Scay

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: I got this game for my 6 year old grandson. It is suitable for all ages and adds a few new twists to the original Uno game!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Does. Not. Work.
customer_reviews.text: This product was the biggest let down of Xmas. It simply does not work - wouldn’t spit the cards out as it’s supposed to. My daughter was super disappointed. We tried everything - different sets of batteries etc. it makes a noise but does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Dec

customer_reviews.title: box crushed
customer_reviews.text: we absolutely love this game and I decided to purchase a second one but the box was so crushed was not sure if damaged, it is working but definitely not gift-able. the game itself is very fun. will have to only reorder the cards the next time
customer_reviews.author: Aeamom

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It
customer_reviews.text: My kids (ages 13, 12, 10, 8) love this as a new twist on Uno. Fun game that keeps them engaged for hours. Easy to learn and very addictive!
customer_reviews.author: HathiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for all ages. This was a gift and we were happy that the box arrived in decent condition.
customer_reviews.author: ilovebooksmn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good game. Quality seemed good. I gifted this for a little bit for his birthday and he seemed to like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Traci Langenbach

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Perfect for Family Game Night!
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfect, and is perfect for a Family Game Night. This UNO Attack Game gives a fun and exciting twist to the original UNO Game, and I would highly recommend it to anyone. The only thing I wish this thing would've included would be batteries. It requires C Batteries, which is both expensive and hard to find, as I had to go to five different stores until I was able to find C batteries. Overall, I love this product, and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: mandmyellow

customer_reviews.title: helps sore lose issues
customer_reviews.text: Four year old loves it. It has been great for dealing with sore loser issues. Kids love hitting the button and seeing cards come shooting out, but the point of the game is to run out of cards so it is better when you push the button and nothing comes out. So, it's win-win (or lose lose) no matter what happens. The cards shooting out help even tempers of getting the bad draw. Glad I bought this game.
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lame
customer_reviews.text: This is a waste of money. The rules are different than normal uno. This thing just shoots out cards if someone draws an Uno attack
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the earlier Uno Attack games, but it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The product works well and is quite cheap. The type of battery they require is uncommon and it is annoying that they front face of the machine every game. The amount of card the game throws is quite predictable, this in a downside as it does not make pressing the button that suspenseful.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 8 year old for Christmas and she couldn’t get enough of playing it. Even my 3 year old would start cracking up when a bunch of cards were spit out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick. All pieces included and the game worked as it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Woods

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter and I play and have a blast. Highly recommended except if you play with more people, set aside some of the 2X cards or you will never finish the game.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. Sometimes the cards get stuck and do not come out. It is an easy fix but it gets annoying when playing with younger kids.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun with grandkids
customer_reviews.text: I love uno and this makes it alot easier to play with my 9 grandkids. Put in a couple extra decks and the game goes on forever. love it. Well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opening to remove cards is difficult
customer_reviews.text: Overall, like the older model, but very hard to open to get the cards out.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love this game. Fun twist on the regular Uno game. Always gets them laughing!
customer_reviews.author: Dotdot

customer_reviews.title: Love this game, fun and exciting!  Kids and adults love to play
customer_reviews.text: The entire family loves this game. You never know what’s next. We wore out our first game, the unit still works but the replacement cards cost as much as a new unit with new cards.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this game at two different suppliers and both refuse to release cards They make sounds and the track spins, but not enough to feed cards through the slot. Not sure if it was a bad batch or what. My mom has this game and her works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Y

customer_reviews.title: Very fun twist to a classic!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun to play with your kids! They will love it! Some new cards with new rules but very easy to follow, really recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: I bought UNO attack and the request of my students to play on the last day of school. The game was well worth the money. It does require batteries, so purchase some in advance of receiving the game. It's easy to set-up, but make sure you follow the instructions to put the cards in properly or they will not fly out in the attack mode. The students enjoyed the game, and as much as I dislike UNO, watching them get excited was exciting for me. :0
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet H.

customer_reviews.title: My family loves this game!
customer_reviews.text: Uno Attack takes the traditional Uno game and raises it to a new, higher level.
customer_reviews.author: GLK2

customer_reviews.title: Family Gun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Definitely adds a little bit more excitement than traditional uno.
customer_reviews.author: fjcon

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandkids last year and decided to buy again for toys for tots donation
customer_reviews.author: Monica Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: My 5, 7 and 9 year olds love to play this game. Great spin on the original game and fun for both adults and kids. It does not come with the needed 3 C batteries.
customer_reviews.author: turtley78

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for our family ages 4 thru 57. Needs 3 C batteries (not included).
customer_reviews.author: D Parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this game. Fast paced family fun! What more can I say.
customer_reviews.author: R. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 6 years old birthday because Uno is his favorite game. We had the original Uno Attack for many years and we love this updated version. We really like that the trade hands card is no longer a part of this game, and the new wild card that you get to pick any player to push the button adds a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Great game! My son loved getting this for Christmas. The whole family enjoys playing for hours on end!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gwin

customer_reviews.title: Great game, dont forget to buy batteries
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect out of the box. You will need 3 C batteries for it. They are not included. We have loved playing it over the holidays, with family. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun game!
customer_reviews.text: We play this often, and it is so much fun! We've taken to other people's homes, and they loved it, too. It's definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Viento

product_meta.title: UNO Attack! Game
product_meta.description: Brace yourself for an exciting, action-Packed way to play UNO! If you draw the Attack! Attack! command card, you have to push the UNO Attack game's sleek electronic card shooter. If you're lucky, nothing will happen. But if you're not, the shooter will fire a stream of UNO Attack cards that you'll have to add to your hand! The shooter makes a variety of sounds to further increase the excitement. You can store the cards in the shooter, so the unit is both portable and storable. The goal is still to get rid of all the cards in your hand, and when you're down to one card, don't forget to yell, "UNO!" Contains 112 cards, card shooter, and instructions. For 2 to 10 players, ages 7 and older. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Random card shooter offers an exciting, unpredictable way to play UNO.
Electronic shooter emits a variety of sounds, which elevates the excitement!
You store the cards in the shooter, so the unit is both portable and storable.
Includes an exclusive Attack! Attack! command card.
​Action and fun for 2 to 10 players, ages 7 and older.
